name: Yaoliang Yu
content: Yaoliang Yu's Webpage Yaoliang Yu University of Waterloo Vector Institute About Me Yaoliang Yu (于耀亮) is currently a faculty in the David R. Cheriton School of Computer Science at University of Waterloo, as well as at the Vector institute. His main research interests include generative models, convex and nonconvex optimization, trustworthy machine learning, and applications in computer vision and natural language processing.
